title: Level up account now or wait till the new leveling system?
body: I mean do I get more with the new system? They said that you will unlock a lot beginner champions during 1-30.

replies.body: You unlock those champions through the new rewards you get when leveling up, but you'll still be able to get all the same benefits even if you start at a later level. I wouldn't necessarily hold off on leveling up.
